segments.advisor_message: Hey there! So, let's start with the basics, right? Can I get your first and last name, just to kick things off?
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, sure! My name's, uh, Alex Johnson. Just Alex for short, you know?

segments.advisor_message: Awesome, Alex! Do you have any middle names or, uh, just the one?
segments.client_message: Uh, no middle names for me, just the Alex Johnson. Simple, right?

segments.advisor_message: Haha, totally! And while we're at it, do you wanna share your birthday or anything like that? Like, just so I can get to know you a bit better!
segments.client_message: Yeah, for sure! I was born on the 15th of March, 1990. Does that help?
